meanings.sent1: She was the miffiest person in the room after waiting for so long.
meanings.sent2: His miffiest expression showed he was not happy with the delay.
meanings.sent3: Even though it was just a small mistake, she put on her miffiest face.
meanings.sent4: The cat gave me the miffiest look when I accidentally stepped on its tail.
meanings.sent5: The miffiest customer demanded to speak to the manager immediately.

meanings.definition: Showing signs of being slightly annoyed or irritated.
meanings.sent1: The teacher's miffiest tone indicated she was not pleased with the behavior.
meanings.sent2: His miffiest gestures made it clear he was upset about something.
meanings.sent3: The dog gave a miffiest bark when the mailman approached the house.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds gathered in a miffiest manner, hinting at a possible downpour.
meanings.sent5: Her miffiest expression warned others to approach with caution.
